targets.query: SELECT count("request") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" = '200') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^2/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^1/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT first("request_time") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^3/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT first("request_time") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^3/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT first("request_time") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^3/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT first("request_host") AS "host", first("request_uri") AS "uri", first("http_referer") AS "referrer", first("request_time") AS "request_time", first("upstream_response_time") AS "upstream_time", first("bytes_sent") AS "bytes_sent", first("http_x_forwarded_for") AS "client_ip", first("http_user_agent") AS "user_agent" FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "nginx" WITH KEY = "host"
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "nginx" WITH KEY = "host"
